attributes.action: ban such busy-bodies as those who called for banning smoking in cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who go around looking for things to complain about or campaign against get the people of Britain really riled up. Stress has been directly linked to early death. Therefore, for the good of the nation's health, they should be banned.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
